titleStmt.title: An act for recovery of publique debts, and other duties belonging to the Common-wealth. Thursday, March 15. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas, clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Streater, and John Macock, printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
